name: ChartProject
description: READNE -Charting is an application that will make charts for a dashboard. -It uses d3 and backbone/marionette as a framework for creating the graphics. -It uses bootstrap for styling and in particular will have a predesigned template. -It uses coffeescript, scss, and jade for languages and will be compiled by gulp. -It uses requirejs for module loading -It uses jasmine, chai, and sinon for testing -It uses bower for all external libraries and npm for all gulp modules. 	-Bower and Node JSON files will be updated when needed.
